description: Parameters in the second level of analysis or activation

threshold.description: default <<1 to sqrt(3)=1.7321>>. Threshold for the sSSBL++ F-scores. lower threshold <<1>> (if <<1>> responses whose posterior variance is larger than the posterior mean are discarded). upper threshold <<sqrt(3)>> (if <<sqrt(3)>> responses whose posterior variance is larger than 3 times the posterior mean are discarded)

IsCurv.description: default <<true>>. Depth compensation factor for the Lead Field of giri and sulci <<false>> (no compensation) <<true>> (compensation)

IsParcel.description: default <<true>>. Structured sparsity with smoothness of the responses within areas <<false>> (no smoothness) <<true>> (parcel smoothness)

IsNeigh.description: default <<false>>. no neighbor structure <<false>>, Laplacian neighbor structure  <<true>>.

IsField.description: default <<2>>. Use projected Lead Field or 3D profile with prior of rotational invariance <<1>> (projected Lead Field) <<2>> (2D field isotropy) <<3>> (3D field isotropy)

aGiri.description: default <<5>>. Baseline of giri curvature factor

aSulc.description: default <<5>>. Baseline of sulci curvature factor. usually is set to be higher than aGiri

bGiri.description: default <<3>>. Scale of giri curvature factor

bSulc.description: default <<3>>. Scale of sulci curvature factor
